name: Mini Spring Rolls
description: Crispy rolls filled with vegetables and served with sweet chili sauce.
recipe: Shred cabbage, carrots, and bean sprouts. Wrap in spring roll wrappers. Deep-fry until golden brown. Serve with sweet chili sauce.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Mushroom caps filled with cheese, herbs, and breadcrumbs.
recipe: Remove mushroom stems, mix cream cheese, garlic, and parsley. Stuff caps and bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.
recipe: Dice tomatoes, mix with olive oil, garlic, and basil. Spoon over toasted baguette slices.

name: Caprese Skewers
description: Cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and basil on skewers drizzled with balsamic glaze.
recipe: Thread tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil onto skewers. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

name: Grilled Chicken/Herbs
description: Juicy grilled chicken marinated in fresh herbs.
recipe: Marinate chicken breasts with olive oil, rosemary, thyme, and garlic. Grill for 6–8 minutes per side.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, roasted vegetables, and creamy cheese sauce.
recipe: Roast zucchini, eggplant, and peppers. Layer with lasagna sheets, ricotta, and tomato sauce. Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender beef strips in a creamy mushroom sauce.
recipe: Sauté beef strips and onions. Add mushrooms, sour cream, and beef stock. Simmer until thickened.

name: Lemon Butter Salmon
description: Pan-seared salmon fillets with lemon butter sauce.
recipe: Season salmon with salt and pepper. Pan-fry in butter. Add lemon juice and parsley before serving.

name: Jollof Rice
description: Jollof Rice is a vibrant West African dish cooked in seasoned tomato sauce.
recipe: Rice simmered in a spiced tomato-pepper blend, with stock, seasonings, and fried vegetables.

name: Egusi Soup
description: Egusi soup is a rich West African stew made from ground melon seeds.
recipe: Ground egusi cooked with palm oil, leafy greens, spices, and assorted meats or fish

name: Okra Soup
description: Okra soup is a savory, thick West African dish with tender, slimy texture.
recipe: Fresh okra simmered with palm oil, spices, meats, and leafy vegetables for flavor.

name: Water Leaves Soup
description: Light, nutritious soup with tender waterleaf, palm oil, meats, and mild spices
recipe: Fresh waterleaf simmered with palm oil, meats, stockfish, and seasonings for flavor.

name: Fruit Punch
description: Refreshing mix of fruit juices served chilled.
recipe: Mix pineapple, orange, and cranberry juices. Add sliced citrus fruits and ice.

name: Miyan Kuka
recipe: Mix fruit juices with soda water and garnish with mint leaves and citrus slices.

name: Edikang Ikong Soup
description: Rich Nigerian vegetable soup made with pumpkin leaves, waterleaf, assorted meats, and fish.
recipe: Pumpkin leaves and waterleaf cooked with palm oil, meats, fish, and traditional spices.

name: Amala Ewedu
description: Traditional Nigerian delicac among the Yoruba people made of yam flour. Ewedu soup is from jute leaves, with locust beans and bean soup.
